text: Ropica piperata is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Pascoe in 1858. It is known from Borneo and Malaysia.BioLib.cz - Ropica piperata. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Ropica (genus) Category:Beetles described in 1858
title: Ropica piperata
